original_text: But the fields of the city and its villages had been given to Caleb the son of Jephunneh as his possession.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 밭과 그 촌락들은 여분네의 아들 갈렙에게 주어 소유가 되게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the fields of the city and its villages
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 성의 들과 그 마을들은

sentences.original_text: had been given to Caleb the son of Jephunneh
